Dumb shits... multi audio in the title means that there is more than one audio track, and one of them is not english.
sorry. How do you play it in English?
My audio came in completely fucked. =/
guys, use a media player called kmplayer. It's pretty user friendly and you can change audio files easily during a movie
The audio is perfectly fine, and was - for me anyway - English by default.

Thanks for the upload, however I later discovered a sort of bug on the .avi file. I do not recall it being the same message da_300_squirrels had, but there was still something attached.
Regarding the video, the quality was superb in both video and audio and a rather large aspect ratio than most others I've downloaded from TPB. Thanks alanwatson, but perhaps a virus or malware scan would be best before playing this file. 
As for language issues, I had no problem playing it with VLC player and it went directly to English automatically.
